title: We've got a LOT of new skins coming out soon ( plus Ekko, possible new champion? )

embed.description: This is a WORK IN PROGRESS POST - check back for constant updates now that today's patch out. The PBE currently still down for maintenance.] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers!

body:
What skins you can expect to see;

- SSW Rengar
- SSW Singed
- SSW Talon
- SSW Thresh
- SSW Twitch
- King of Clubs Mordekaiser
- Queen of Diamonds Syndra
- Wild Card Shaco
- Ace of Spades Ezreal
- Star Guardian Lux

The existing skin Jack of Hearts Twisted Fate is getting a splash art change.

We've also got foreign sound bites of an unreleased champion named "Ekko". Thanks to a slight Rioter leak posted on Reddit, they hinted that the champion will be based on time, and may have an ultimate that can rewind time. Interesting....

Info taken from Reddit and SurrenderAt20.

replies.body: King of Clubs Mordekaisers' splash art makes him look so damn good... Almost like a god with the amount of gold and white he's wearing :D Definitely a buy even though I don't play him much.
